review: Controlling playback on this thing is like controlling the Mars rover.. I push a button and 30 seconds later it responds, but glitches out a/v sync the whole time. The area is well ventilated, tv is not wall mounted, it's on a 50mbps connection, and it's less than ten feet from the (one month old) router. Just a waste of $50 sadly, pay the extra for something with reasonable processing power..
